description.raw:
Since we added ERB support to the CLI, we've been passing the world SDF string to `Server`, so we don't hit [this line](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/736f7a248438ffa0713e6dd30eb4450318fa9f6b/src/Server.cc#lines-164) that prints the file path anymore.

This change prints the world file path even when using the cli:

~~~
$ ign gazebo -v 4 shapes.sdf                                                                         
[Msg] Ignition Gazebo GUI    v2.7.1                                                                                        
[Msg] Ignition Gazebo Server v2.7.1                                                                                         
[Msg] Loading SDF world file[/home/developer/ws/install/share/ignition/ignition-gazebo2/worlds/shapes.sdf].
~~~

If a config is passed to the server which has both the XML and the file path, the XML is used.
